page.title: 05Recreation and Homelife
page.content:
Recreation
This is limited to the individual interests of the separate households, which embraces walking, horse riding, rough shooting, as well as the usual domestic entertainments. Some people visit the fen at the weekends for walking and bird watching, or drive through to the marinas and moorings near Swaffham Lock and Upware.
Homelife
Most people in the fen enjoy modern facilities, freezers, TVs, phones, microwaves, bathrooms and cars. Sewage disposal is a cesstank in the garden. Distance to the nearest shop is often more than a mile, and much of the cost of transport is due to daily journeys of only a few miles.
